about_the_game:
"Mega Gem" is a turn-based strategy game that combines backpack management and light Rogue elements.

The beginning of the story

The world has become unstable, space rifts have appeared in various places, and monsters have descended on this land.

At the same time, many magical gems have appeared in this world, and these gems can enhance the user's abilities.

You have to play the role of a warrior, killing all kinds of monsters that have passed through time, finding the source, and saving this disintegrating world.

How to play

You can enter combat at any time.

Turn-based combat allows for multiple retries to experiment with gem combinations.

At the same time, defeating enemies can obtain gold coins used to purchase new gems, and will also drop gem loot.

After the battle begins, you need to continuously organize gems and build your own combination.

Moreover, monsters have a variety of unique skills. You have to carefully understand their abilities and combine your gems according to the situation.

As long as you pay enough attention, you can create a combination that will kill all enemies.

Lots of gems and builds

  • More than 200 exquisite gemstones

  • Dozens of attribute data, combined with skills can form unique strategies and tactics

  • There are more than 20 sets available, and each set has its own characteristics and unique skills.

  • In addition to ordinary gems, there are also rarer unique gems. Unique gems have unique skills that can enrich your mix and inject core strength.

  • More than 30 different types of universal artifacts are available.

Playability

Simple, addictive and challenging gameplay with fun replayability at any time
